Request for standing order for Insinger de BeaufortEquity Trust Cc Insinger de Beaufort Equity Trust Co NV This Netherlands company is the corporate manager for our Dutch international corporations appx They hold all the corporate records of these entities and they will not release them nor will they perform any services until they are paid In addition I understand from Tim DeSpain that they are holding Treasury funds pending payment of fees and that he is pursuing this issue too Equity Trust acts as the sole Director for these companies which means that only Equity Trust can sign corporate documents on behalf of these companies They prepare and register all necessary filings numerous with the Companies Register and advise us and keep us in line on Dutch corporate law They will not advise us on Dutch bankruptcy proceeding requirements until we make good on the outstanding amount Outstanding fees total EUR which equals appx US plus we would need a float going forward so that they could draw from it Invoices are up to months old and many of them are the responsibility of Enron Europe group None of the companies involved has filed for bankruptcy Kate B Cole Director Corporate Services Enron Corp Tel Fax Email

Proposed dissolutionsThe below listed Delaware limited partnerships that were formed but never utilized are being considered for dissolution Please let me know by Wednesday December if there is any reason not to terminate If I receive no responses we will proceed with dissolution EGC Holding Company LP EGC Holding Company LP Kate B Cole Director Corporate Services Enron Corp Tel Fax Email

Access to corporate data sheets at weekend Cc Ive instigated the following change instead of running the report to update the online corporate data sheets each weekend which frequently means that no data sheets are available until Monday Ive requested they be run on Thursday evening to be ready by Friday morning This way anybody working over the weekend will have the data sheets Of course we continue to be available for data not accessible through the data sheets Hope this helps a little Best regards Kate Kate B Cole Director Corporate Services Enron Corp Tel Fax Email

Portland General Property Holdings Inc CoVThe captioned Texas corporation is being considered for dissolution Please let me know by Wednesday November if there is any reason not to terminate If I receive no responses we will proceed with dissolution Kate B Cole Director Corporate Services Enron Corp Tel Fax Email

Owenreagh Power Partners LimitedJim An update on the Owenreagh Power Partners letter that you received and forwarded to me for handling It appears from the below emails that it is a problem getting an auditor to prepare the accounts However I was informed that the file date has been extended to The following message re the file date is from Debbie Pritt FYI I just spoke with Janet of Companies House and verified with her that the Form I submitted is to extend the filing date from to She indicated that this month filing period will be approved and that all subsequent filings will be for the period ended Ill keep you informed as I hear more info KC Kate B Cole Director Corporate Services Enron Corp Tel Fax Email Original Message From Pritt Deborah Sent November AM To Kelly Sue Wood Christopher Buckley Cindy Cole Kate Cc Gunther Dave Aird Gordon Newell Eric Badger Dan Westbeld Mike Subject FW Enron Well Gordon and I are certainly stunned DT has refused to do the audit Gordon knows a UK Chartered Accountant located here in Houston so he is trying to contact him We are exploring any options at this time Debbie Debbie Pritt Senior Accounting Specialist Enron Wind Phone Fax Original Message From Sharma Sanjay UK London mailto Sent Tuesday November AM To Pritt Deborah Aird Gordon Cc Hamilton Ian UK London Cheshire Joe UK London Subject FW Enron Original Message From Turner Mike UK London Sent November To Sharma Sanjay UK London Subject Enron Dear Debbie Further to receiving all the documentation relating to Owenreagh last week we have looked at the work we would need to perform surrounding all of the entities that surround the current structure of the UK company and are concerned that this would prove to be an expensive way to conduct the work For example we have no knowledge of the Cayman Island company or the Windfarm project itself as we are not auditors Additionally the current pressure on the Enron shareprice and possible acquisition by Dynergy suggests that your current auditors Andersons should be performing the work as they may be expected to have more knowledge of the group than us This does not impact upon the current tax restructuring advise being given Regards Sanjay

FW Sale of East Coast Power LLCJamespst Please note that an additional subsidiary was included in the sale referenced below Orange Service Company LLC Kate B Cole Director Corporate Services Enron Corp Tel Fax Email Original Message From Cole Kate Sent May PM To Mellencamp Lisa Heinitz Mary Aune Stacey A Barrow Cynthia Bouillion James L Callahan Teresa Carnahan Kathleen Cole Kate Dallman Larry Davis Hardie Derrick Jr James Hu Sylvia King Jr Frazier Kitchen Louise Korkmas Deb LaBaume Wanda Lavorato John Leo Johnson Li Ling Maxwell Matt Moore Jerry Thomas Murray Julia Perkins Mary Pham Lynda Pinder Lori Priddy Janice Rice Greek SAP Master Data Swafford John Whalley Greg Whiting Greg Subject Sale of East Coast Power LLC East Coast Power LLC a Delaware limited liability company and its direct and indirect subsidiaries as listed below were sold to El Paso Energy Corporation on February Subsidiaries included in sale Empire Energy Supply LLC JEDI Bayonne GP LLC Cogen Technologies NJ Venture JEDI Camden GP LLC Cogen Technologies Camden GP Limited Partnership Camden Cogen LP JEDI Camden LP LLC JEDI Linden NB LLC JEDI Linden Inc JEDI Linden GP LLC Cogen Technologies Linden Ltd Cogen Technologies Linden Venture LP JEDI Linden LP LLC Chelton Service Company LLC Evidence is on file in the th floor corporate vault Please share this information with other interested parties NOTE Sylvia Hu evidence to follow by hand Kate B Cole Director Corporate Services Enron Corp Tel Fax Email

RE Ste Aurelie Timberlands Co Ltd Cc clarification SOP is currently made on an individual John J Flaherty Congress St POBox Portland ME Mr JMGagne of Fasken Martineau Dumoulin a law firm in Quebec handles the corporate records but not SOP KC Kate B Cole Director Corporate Services Enron Corp Tel Fax Email Original Message From Cheek Charles Sent May PM To Korkmas Deb Cc del Vecchio Peter Haedicke Mark Cole Kate Stephens Becky Subject Ste Aurelie Timberlands Co Ltd I understand that you have expressed a preference that service of process upon this recently acquired domestic company be received by Canadian counsel This is contrary to the procedure that we implemented a couple of years ago whereby a corporate agent has been assigned as agent for service of process relative to all domestic entities affiliated with Enron Corp in all states Currently that agent is NRAI There are two exceptions PGE and Limbach Both of these companies requested and were granted exceptions to the SOP procedure for specific business needs Please provide me the basis for the requested exception as to the captioned company Of course we will make every effort to accommodate the specific business needs of this company Also please advise whether you or someone on your behalf has determined that the laws in each state in which the company is incorporated and does business permits SOP on a foreign individual Thanks

Documents awaiting John Lavoratos signatureMark Im going ahead and faxing the documents that I have already got signed to Brian Korn at Weil Gotschal FAX Ill tell him that Lavoratos signature will be faxed to him by your office when youve been able to get it Please let me have the originals so that I can get them to Brian The docs to be faxed are Written Consent of Directors of PBOG Corp re approval of Agreement and Plan of Merger between PBOG and Hartsook you already signed this one and Certificate of Merger Sorry its such a problem getting Js signature I tried my best Kate Kate B Cole Director Corporate Services Enron Corp Tel Fax Email

RE Ste Aurelie Timberlands Co Ltd Cc clarification SOP is currently made on an individual John J Flaherty Congress St POBox Portland ME Mr JMGagne of Fasken Martineau Dumoulin a law firm in Quebec handles the corporate records but not SOP KC Kate B Cole Director Corporate Services Enron Corp Tel Fax Email Original Message From Cheek Charles Sent May PM To Korkmas Deb Cc del Vecchio Peter Haedicke Mark Cole Kate Stephens Becky Subject Ste Aurelie Timberlands Co Ltd I understand that you have expressed a preference that service of process upon this recently acquired domestic company be received by Canadian counsel This is contrary to the procedure that we implemented a couple of years ago whereby a corporate agent has been assigned as agent for service of process relative to all domestic entities affiliated with Enron Corp in all states Currently that agent is NRAI There are two exceptions PGE and Limbach Both of these companies requested and were granted exceptions to the SOP procedure for specific business needs Please provide me the basis for the requested exception as to the captioned company Of course we will make every effort to accommodate the specific business needs of this company Also please advise whether you or someone on your behalf has determined that the laws in each state in which the company is incorporated and does business permits SOP on a foreign individual Thanks

KC out of office from noon today Cc If you have documents for signature please send them up before noon otherwise Ill sign them on Monday Have a great weekend Kate Kate B Cole Director Corporate Services Enron Corp Tel Fax Email

RE Corporate Entities Enron Marketing Services Inc changed its name to Engas Inc and it was dissolved Enron Oil Trading Transportation Company is a former name of EOTT Energy Corp a Delaware entity that merged out of existence Chain of events rather complex am Merger of EOTT Energy Corp Del inc with and into EOTT Energy Texas Inc Name change of EOTT Energy Texas Inc to EOTT Energy Corp am Merger of EOTT Energy Corp Tex inc creating Transitional Operating Company Inc Transitional Common Carrier Company Inc and OHS Properties Inc pm Merger of EOTT Energy Corp Tex inc into JMRM Energy Corp Delinc Let me know if you need more or if you need copies of documents KC Kate B Cole Director Corporate Services Enron Corp Tel Fax Email Original Message From Heard Marie Sent October PM To Cole Kate Subject Corporate Entities Kate Can you do an historical analysis for Enron Marketing Services Inc and Enron Oil Trading Transportation Thanks Marie

RE Corporate EntitiesIll start on this immediately Marie Kate Kate B Cole Director Corporate Services Enron Corp Tel Fax Email Original Message From Heard Marie Sent October AM To Cole Kate Callahan Teresa Subject Corporate Entities Kate and Teresa We are working on a time sensitive project and ask that you assist us in determining the names of various Enron entities by doing an historical analysis or whatever means you use The entities I need info on are Enron Gas Processing Company Enron Gas Marketing Canada Enron Oil Canada Ltd Enron Oil Corporation Are these prior names of current Enron entities are they existing entities etc Please call me if you need any additional info or if my request is confusing Thanks for your help Marie x

RE Corporate EntitiesSee below answers let me know if you need corporate data sheets or any other info Kate Kate B Cole Director Corporate Services Enron Corp Tel Fax Email Original Message From Heard Marie Sent October AM To Cole Kate Callahan Teresa Subject Corporate Entities Kate and Teresa We are working on a time sensitive project and ask that you assist us in determining the names of various Enron entities by doing an historical analysis or whatever means you use The entities I need info on are Enron Gas Processing Company Cole Kate Divested to KN Processing Inc subsidiary of KN Energy Inc Enron Gas Marketing Canada Cole Kate Enron Gas Liquids Canada Ltd and Canadian Gas Marketing Inc amalgamated with Enron Gas Marketing Canada Inc to form Enron Gas Services Canada Corp Enron Oil Canada Ltd Cole Kate Divested Spun off to EOG Resources and changed its name to EOG Resources Canada Inc Enron Oil Corporation Cole Kate Dissolved Are these prior names of current Enron entities are they existing entities etc Please call me if you need any additional info or if my request is confusing Thanks for your help Marie x

Joint Energy Development Investments II LP Cc Heather the original of the Action of General Partner for the captioned LP was inadvertently sent to you yesterday by Jeff instead of being sent here to the minute book I know he had a temp assisting him so thats probably where the hiccup occurred Would you please take your copy of the original and return the original to me Many thanks Best regards Kate Kate B Cole Director Corporate Services Enron Corp Tel Fax Email

Enron Corp and Subsidiary List Cc an alpha report and email it to Tana Thanks Kate Forwarded by Kate ColeCorpEnron on AM Tana CT PM To Kate NRON cc Mark CT Subject Enron Corp and Subsidiary List We are in the process of filing our annual hedge exemptions with the NYMEX for In connection therewith I will need to provide the NYMEX with an updated copy of the alphabetical list of Enron Corp and Subsidiary Companies Thanks Kate as usual for your help with this

RE Timber I LLC Cc Elaine As you are the guru of publicly traded entities would you please respond to Tanas question Thanks a bunch Kate Kate B Cole Director Corporate Services Enron Corp Tel Fax Email Original Message From Spencer Becky Sent October PM To Cole Kate Subject Timber I LLC Importance High Kate Per Tana Jones request would you please update the attached powerpoint slide as to the ownership of EOTT Energy Partners LP Need ASAP You can fax back if quicker to Tana at Thank you Becky x File EOTT Energy Canada LPppt

Happy Holidays Cc Im leaving now Teresa Larry Lillian Irene and I have closed down for a few days Weve satisfied all the demands of the bankruptcy attorneys and Dan Lyons and Travis McCullough no mean feat Im hoping to be out until Thursday but Ill check my email and voicemail on Wednesday and come in if necessary Home number HoHoHo Kate Kate B Cole Director Corporate Services Enron Corp Tel Fax Email

Hierarchy list as discussed please save first then review otherwise you might lose the indentations its a very unsophisticated document as yet but one of these fine days well bring it into this century Regards Kate Kate B Cole Director Corporate Services Enron Corp Tel Fax Email

Payment of vital vendors Cc Richard I understand from Hardie Davis that he has spoken to you regarding payments of outstanding invoices and payment of future services to certain vendors without whom we cannot do business In the field of corporate secretary services we urgently need the assistance of Premier Corporate Services and Capital Services to be able to pursue the future business plan Without their services we cannot quickly incorporate a company or qualify a company to do business in other states We cannot obtain certified documents from the Secretaries of State for future asset sales Hardie Davis has already given you details of the amounts in question I believe that you may have already been approached regarding similar vital services from incountry managers who handle hundreds of our companies in The Netherlands Cayman Islands and Mauritius These companies control our corporate records and they will not provide further assistance unless their invoices are paid If you require additional information please call me at the below number I look forward to hearing from you most urgently Best regards Kate Kate B Cole Director Corporate Services Enron Corp Tel Fax Email

RE Enron Metall Recycling GmbH Co KG Cc should ask I asked that question a long time ago to London legal but Ive not managed to get a response yet Cindy The AJ memo shows as follows Directors MG Metall Recycling Verwaltungs GmbH Management Officers Achim Lindhorst Hermann Ritterbach Micahel Schaaf Stefan Scheppler HansPeter Schneider My questions are still the same i what is the title of each of the officers and ii should I name the directors of MG Metall Recycling Verwaltungs GmbH as directors of the captioned co Until I get a response my hands are tied Susan this is probably not too helpful to you but you can see my dilemma Best regards Kate Kate B Cole Director Corporate Services Enron Corp Tel Fax Email Original Message From Bailey Susan Sent May PM To Cole Kate Cc Shackleton Sara Subject Enron Metall Recycling GmbH Co KG Importance High Kate Hi Please advise Who is an authorized signatory for the captioned Enron affiliate According to the Secretariat Database no directors officers or managing directors have been designated Reason for inquiry I need to get an ISDA Master Agreement executed for this Enron affiliate in order that their financial FX transactions can be confirmed under said ISDA I look forward to your response Cordially Susan S Bailey Enron North America Corp Smith Street Suite A Houston Texas Phone Fax Email

RE Enron Metall Recycling GmbH Co KG Cc should ask I asked that question a long time ago to London legal but Ive not managed to get a response yet Cindy The AJ memo shows as follows Directors MG Metall Recycling Verwaltungs GmbH Management Officers Achim Lindhorst Hermann Ritterbach Micahel Schaaf Stefan Scheppler HansPeter Schneider My questions are still the same i what is the title of each of the officers and ii should I name the directors of MG Metall Recycling Verwaltungs GmbH as directors of the captioned co Until I get a response my hands are tied Susan this is probably not too helpful to you but you can see my dilemma Best regards Kate Kate B Cole Director Corporate Services Enron Corp Tel Fax Email Original Message From Bailey Susan Sent May PM To Cole Kate Cc Shackleton Sara Subject Enron Metall Recycling GmbH Co KG Importance High Kate Hi Please advise Who is an authorized signatory for the captioned Enron affiliate According to the Secretariat Database no directors officers or managing directors have been designated Reason for inquiry I need to get an ISDA Master Agreement executed for this Enron affiliate in order that their financial FX transactions can be confirmed under said ISDA I look forward to your response Cordially Susan S Bailey Enron North America Corp Smith Street Suite A Houston Texas Phone Fax Email
